changeSet.author: garlikoff
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO real_estate_object_param ( user_id, location, area, number_of_bedrooms, number_of_bathrooms, type, furnishings, elevator, balcony_terrace, garage_parking, garden_yard, pool, storeroom, housing_condition, floor, air_conditioner, heating, energy_certificate, year_built, orientation ) SELECT NULL, NULL, ROUND(45 + (s.i % 120) + ((s.i % 100) / 100.0), 2), (s.i % 6) + 1, CASE (s.i % 3) WHEN 0 THEN 1 WHEN 1 THEN 2 ELSE 3 END, CASE (s.i % 3) WHEN 0 THEN 'Квартиры' WHEN 1 THEN 'Дома' ELSE 'Комнаты' END, CASE (s.i % 3) WHEN 0 THEN 'Меблировано' WHEN 1 THEN 'Частично меблировано' ELSE 'Без мебели' END, (s.i % 2 = 0), CASE (s.i % 3) WHEN 0 THEN 'Балкон' WHEN 1 THEN 'Терраса' ELSE 'Нет' END, CASE (s.i % 3) WHEN 0 THEN 'Гараж' WHEN 1 THEN 'Парковка' ELSE 'Нет' END, CASE (s.i % 3) WHEN 0 THEN 'Сад' WHEN 1 THEN 'Двор' ELSE 'Нет' END, (s.i % 5 = 0), (s.i % 4 = 0), CASE (s.i % 4) WHEN 0 THEN 'Новое' WHEN 1 THEN 'Отремонтированное' WHEN 2 THEN 'Хорошее' ELSE 'Требует ремонта' END, (ARRAY['Sótano','Semisótano','Planta baja','Entreplanta','Principal','1º','2º','3º','Ático','Sobreático','Buhardilla'])[(s.i % 11) + 1], (s.i % 2 = 0), CASE (s.i % 3) WHEN 0 THEN 'Газовое' WHEN 1 THEN 'Электрическое' ELSE 'Нет' END, (ARRAY['A','B','C','D','E','F','G'])[(s.i % 7) + 1], 1950 + (s.i % 70), CASE (s.i % 4) WHEN 0 THEN 'Север' WHEN 1 THEN 'Юг' WHEN 2 THEN 'Запад' ELSE 'Восток' END FROM generate_series(1, 1000) AS s(i);
